oic.sec.sp.name.description: A string specifying the security profile
detail-desc: oic.sec.sp.unspecified - The security profile is not specified
oic.sec.sp.baseline - This specifies the OCF Baseline security profile
oic.sec.sp.black - This specifies the OCF Black security profile
oic.sec.sp.blue - This specifies the OCF Blue security profile
